header.title: Switirhisiwa swa Salatiso swa OHS
sidebar.inspections_audits: Kuhlolwa na Ku Hlola Timhaka ta Mali
sidebar.step_0.title: ðŸ“œ Wamukeriwile eSwitirhisiweni swa Salatiso swa OHS
sidebar.step_0.description: Tshungula switirhisiwa swa hina leswi simekeke kakhulu na switirhisiwa ku tlakusa vuhlayiseki bya vutumbuluxi eka ndhawu ya wena ya ntirho.
sidebar.step_0.fun_fact: âš¡ Xana u tiva leswaku ku tirhisa baphakeli labahleke bangakhona ku hunguta tingoti endhawini ya ntirho hi ku tiyisisa leswaku ntirho wu endliwa hi nkarhi nkarhi kantsi wu na tindlela letiphakame kakhulu ta vuhlayiseki?
intro.title: Wamukeriwile eSwitirhisiweni swa Salatiso swa OHS
intro.description: Tshungula switirhisiwa swa hina leswi simekeke kakhulu na switirhisiwa ku tlakusa vuhlayiseki bya vutumbuluxi eka ndhawu ya wena ya ntirho.
legal_obligations.client.title: Swibopho swa Muklayenti
legal_obligations.client.reg_5_1_a: Construction Regulation 5(1)(a): Lungisela Ku Hlola Vutlhari bya Ntolovelo (BRA) lebyi kombaka tingoti ta phurojeke.
legal_obligations.client.reg_5_1_b: Construction Regulation 5(1)(b): Phakela Xivumbeko xa Vutumbuluxi na Vuhlayiseki lexi byalaka tidzingo leti khethekile ta phurojeke.
legal_obligations.client.reg_5_1_l: Construction Regulation 5(1)(l): Amukela Pholisi ya Vutumbuluxi na Vuhlayiseki ya Muklayenti ngaphambi loku ntirho wu sungula.
legal_obligations.contractor.title: Swibopho swa Mukontiraka
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_7_1_a: Construction Regulation 7(1)(a): Romela Pholisi ya Vutumbuluxi na Vuhlayiseki leyi sekelwe eka xikombiso xa muklayenti.
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_7_1_b: Construction Regulation 7(1)(b): Hlenga Fhayili ya Vutumbuluxi na Vuhlayiseki eka sayiti leyi na tindzhawu tonkhe leti faneleke.
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_9: Construction Regulation 9: Endla Ku Hlola Vutlhari na Ku Hlola Tingoti (HIRA) leti khethekile eka ntirho.
legal_obligations.professional.title: Swibopho swa Mutirhi wa H&S
legal_obligations.professional.reg_5_5: Construction Regulation 5(5): Baphakeli (PrCHSA) balawula H&S egameni la muklayenti, ba tiyisisa ku landzela muthetho.
legal_obligations.professional.reg_8_5: Construction Regulation 8(5): Tikhomishinara (CHSO) ta tisa baphakeli hi ku tirhisa na ku hlola switirhisiwa swa H&S.
legal_obligations.professional.sacpcmp: Switirhisiwa swa SACPCMP: Kufanele ahlayise ngodiso na tidzingo ta CPD ta tindhawu ta vutumbuluxi.

training.title: Vuleteri byo Hlaya bya Ndhawu ya Ntirho
training.description: Tshungula tindlela ta hina ta vuleteri bya ndhawu ya ntirho leti fambelanaka ku tiyisisa ku landzela mithetho ya OHS ya Afrika Dzonga na ku khuthaza ndhawu ya ntirho leyi hlayisekeke. Khetha vuleteri byo tirha hi mawoko, vuleteri bya xikweleti, kumbe u tirhise wizard ya hina ku kuma tindlela leti khethekile leti sekelwe eka indasitri ya wena, vanhu lava va langiweke, na ndhawu.
training.action_buttons.view_manual: Thenga Manual ya Vuleteri leyi nga Fambisani

training.cart.checkout.disclaimer: Xiviko xa SafetyHelp: Switirhisiwa swa vuleteri leswi nikiweke i swa xikongomelo xikan'we futhi a swi vumbi tindlela ta vutumbuluxi. Ku kuma tindlela ta OHS leti khethekile, hi kombela u kombela eka SafetyHelp hi support@safetyhelp.co.za kumbe u vakashela Pheji ya Ku Xikombelwa.
training.checkout.success: Ku tshenta ku humelerile! Switirhisiwa swa wena swa vuleteri swi hlanganisiwile. Downloda ti-PDF ta wena laha hansi. Ku kuma vuleteri eka inthaneti, ti-khodi ta ku ngena ti romeriwe ku wena hi i-imeyili.
training.checkout.online_codes: Ti-Khodi ta Ku Ngena eka Vuleteri eka Inthaneti:
training.providers.title: Baphakeli ba Vuleteri ba Amukeriweke
training.providers.description: Xana u lava vuleteri bya munhu munhu? Xikombela eka baphakeli ba vuleteri ba amukeriweke hi tidzingo ta wena.

training.providers.provider_2: SafeSkills Academy - Yi Ngodisiwile eka SACPCMP - Yi Khethekile eka Vuhlayiseki bya Vutumbuluxi - Ku Xikombelwa: training@safeskills.co.za
training.providers.provider_3: SafetyHelp Training - Vuleteri byo Hlaya bya OHS - Ku Xikombelwa: support@safetyhelp.co.za
training.manual.purchase.title: Thenga Manual ya Vuleteri leyi nga Fambisani
training.manual.purchase.description: Kuma manual ya vuleteri yo hlaya leyi hlanganiselwe khampani ya wena, leyi na tidzingo ta muthetho, swilo swi khethekile swa khampani swi sekelwe eka phurofayili ya wena ya vutlhari, na ti-khoteÅ¡eni ku suka eka baphakeli ba vuleteri ba amukeriweke.

training.list.search_placeholder.training.legal_fact.step_1: Xikombelo xa Muthetho: Muthetho wa OHS Xikombelo xa 8 u lava leswaku baphakeli ba nikela hi vuleteri lebyi hlawuriweke hi tingoti leti khethekile ta ndhawu ya ntirho.
training.list.search_placeholder.training.fun_fact.step_2: Xikombelo Xo Tlanga: Xana u tiva leswaku vuleteri byo hlawuleka byi nga hunguta tinhlamuselo ta ndhawu ya ntirho ku fika eka 30%?
training.list.search_placeholder.training.legal_fact.step_3: Xikombelo xa Muthetho: Tikomiti ta le kaya ti nga va na mithetho ya OHS leyi hlanganaka leyi amaka tidzingo ta vuleteri.
training.list.search_placeholder.training.fun_fact.step_4: Xikombelo Xo Tlanga: Ndhawu ta ntirho leti na vutlhari byi phakamile tani hi ti-sayiti ta vutumbuluxi ti lava vuleteri byo hlawuleka ku hlayisa tindlela ta vuhlayiseki.
training.list.search_placeholder.training.legal_fact.step_5: Xikombelo xa Muthetho: Muthetho wa OHS u lava vuleteri byo khethekile eka swibopho tani hi batsundzuxi ba SHE ku tiyisisa ku landzela muthetho.
training.list.search_placeholder.legislation.title: Muthetho wa OHS na Kulawula Vutlhari
training.list.search_placeholder.legislation.description: Endla muthetho wa OHS na pholisi ya kulawula vutlhari leyi hlanganiselwe vutumbuluxi bya wena. Faka vuxokoxoko bya khampani ya wena, mintirho, na tingoti ku kuma xitumbuluxo xo hlaya xa ku landzela lexi nga na muthetho wa Afrika Dzonga, mithetho ya tikomiti ta le kaya, na tindlela ta tiko.
training.list.search_placeholder.legislation.wizard.title: Endla RMP Ya Wena
training.list.search_placeholder.legislation.wizard.step_1.title: Xikombelo xa 1 ku ya eka 4: Vuxokoxoko bya Khampani
training.list.search_placeholder.legislation.wizard.step_2.title: Xikombelo xa 2 ku ya eka 4: Mintirho

training.list.search_placeholder.legislation.cart.title: Ku Tshenta
training.list.search_placeholder.legislation.cart.description: RMP ya wena yi hlanganisiwile! Tirhisa khodi ya vawutÅ¡ha FREERMP2025 ku downloda mahala (vanhu va kuqala va 100).
training.list.search_placeholder.suppliers.title: Nhlayo ya Baphakeli ba OHS
training.list.search_placeholder.suppliers.description: Kuma u hlanganisa baphakeli ba OHS eAfrika Dzonga. Lava hi ndhawu, tinsiza, na ti-sertifiketi. Romela tihlanganiso ku tlangela van'wana va endla swikombelo leswi tiviweke.
training.list.search_placeholder.suppliers.list.title: Nhlayo ya Baphakeli
training.list.search_placeholder.suppliers.table.name: Xivongo xa Muphakeli
training.list.search_placeholder.suppliers.review_form.title: Romela Tihlanganiso
training.list.search_placeholder.community_tools.title: Switirhisiwa swa Vuhlayiseki bya Miphakatsi
training.list.search_placeholder.community_tools.description: Xiviko xa tinhlamuselo ta vuhlayiseki kumbe vutlhari eka miphakatsi ya wena kumbe ndhawu ya wena ya ntirho, ku suka eka ti-gorha ku ya eka switirhisiwa leswi sa tirhi kahle. Tirhisa switirhisiwa swa hina ku tiyisisa vuhlayiseki eka tindhawu tani hi ti-storo ta spaza, swikolo, swibedlhele, na ti-bar.
training.list.search_placeholder.community_tools.incident_report.title: Xiviko xa Tinhlamuselo kumbe Vutlhari
training.list.search_placeholder.community_tools.incident_report.location: Ndhawu yi ta kumiwa hi ku tiendlekela...
training.list.search_placeholder.community_tools.incident_report.weather_: Xiyimo xa Maxelo xi ta kumiwa hi ku tiendlekela...
training.list.search_placeholder.community_tools.incident_report.descript: Byalaka tinhlamuselo kumbe vutlhari (xik., gorha eMain Street, xitulu lexi tshovekeke eka xikolo xa miphakatsi)...
training.list.search_placeholder.community_tools.incident_report.user_con: Faka foni kumbe i-imeyili ya wena...
training.list.search_placeholder.community_tools.incident_report.user_soc: Handle Ya Wena ya Social Media (Ku Khetha, xik., @username eka X):
Faka handle ya wena ya X...
training.list.search_placeholder.community_tools.incident_report.provider: Vuxokoxoko bya Ku Xikombelwa bya Muphakeli wa Tinsiza (Ku Khetha):
Faka foni kumbe i-imeyili (yi ta tatiwa hi ku tiendlekela loko muphakeli a khethiwe)...
Handle ya Social Media ya Muphakeli wa Tinsiza (Ku Khetha, xik., @CityofJoburgZA eka X):
Faka handle ya X (yi ta tatiwa hi ku tiendlekela loko muphakeli a khethiwe)...
training.list.search_placeholder.community_tools.list.title: Swin'wana Switirhisiwa swa Vuhlayiseki bya Miphakatsi
training.list.search_placeholder.community_tools.list.spaza_shop.title: Nhlayo ya Vuhlayiseki ya Sitolo sa Spaza
training.list.search_placeholder.community_tools.list.spaza_shop.descript: Tiyisisa leswaku sitolo sa wena sa spaza si fikelela tidzingo ta vuhlayiseki bya mlilo, gezi, na vutumbuluxi hi ku ya hi mithetho ya tikomiti ta le kaya na muthetho wa OHS.
training.list.search_placeholder.community_tools.list.school.title: Xikombelo xa Vuhlayiseki bya Mlilo xa Xikolo
training.list.search_placeholder.community_tools.list.school.description: Dyondza tidzingo ta muthetho ta vuhlayiseki bya mlilo eka swikolo, ku katsa na tinhlelo ta ku famba na switirhisiwa.
training.list.search_placeholder.community_tools.list.hospital.title: Xikombelo xa Ku Lulamisa Xihundla xa Xibedlhele
training.list.search_placeholder.community_tools.list.hospital.descriptio: Tiyisisa leswaku swibedlhele swi lulamisele xihundla hi tinhlelo ta ku famba leti faneleke na switirhisiwa swa vuhlayiseki.
training.list.search_placeholder.community_tools.list.tavern.title: Nhlayo ya Vuhlayiseki ya Tavern
training.list.search_placeholder.community_tools.list.tavern.description: Hlola leswaku ti-tavern ti landzela mithetho ya vuhlayiseki bya mlilo na kulawula vanhu ku hlayisa tinhlamuselo.
training.list.search_placeholder.dashboard.title: Dashboard ya Lilunga

training.list.search_placeholder.document_categories.title: Hlanganisa Tindzhawu ta Pholisi Ya Wena ya Kulawula OHS
training.list.search_placeholder.document_categories.description: Khetha u hlanganisa tindzhawu leti u nga ta ti lava eka pholisi ya wena ya kulawula OHS. Khetha eka tipholisi, tinhlelo, tindlela, na tswin'wana, leti hlanganiselwe tidzingo ta khampani ya wena.
